docs.title: Welcome to PhoenixCore Documentation!
docs.text:
PhoenixCore is an addon for GregTech CEu Modern designed to expand the technical horizons of modern Minecraft.

!!! danger "Under Construction" This documentation is a work in progress. Some recipes, multiblocks, or materials may be missing or subject to change.

If you find an issue or have a suggestion, come chat with us on [our Discord](https://discord.gg/your-link).

docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started
docs.text:
Whether you're looking for new ore processing chains or high-tier machinery, start here:

  • Installation Guide - How to add PhoenixCore to your modpack.
  • First Steps - Understanding the new early-game tweaks.

docs.title: 🛠️ Key Features
docs.text: !!! note "New Multiblocks" PhoenixCore adds several high-performance multiblocks to streamline your factory. Check the Machines tab for details.

docs.title: Want to Help?
docs.text: If you'd like to contribute to these docs or report a bug, please visit our GitHub Repository.

docs.title: Developer Documentation
docs.text: Interested in building on top of PhoenixCore? Use the following information to set up your environment.

docs.title: 📦 Dependency Info
docs.text:
Add the following to your build.gradle to use PhoenixCore as a dependency:

```gradle repositories { maven { url = "https://maven.your-link.com" // Update with your maven } }

dependencies { implementation "com.phoenixvine:PhoenixCore:${pc_version}" }

docs.title: Gameplay Overview
docs.text: Welcome to the core of PhoenixCore. This guide covers the primary changes and additions to the GregTech ecosystem.

docs.title: 📈 Progression Tiers
docs.text:
PhoenixCore introduces specialized modules across the standard GT tiers.

!!! note "Early Game (ULV - LV)" Focus on basic material gathering and the new Phoenix primitive smelter. * Steam Age Tweaks * Foundry Basics

!!! success "Mid Game (MV - HV)" Automate your first custom chemical lines. * Plastic Refining * Basic Multiblocks

docs.title: 🛠️ Key New Systems
docs.text:
PhoenixCore expands on specific technical niches:

Feature Description Heat Management New mechanics for high-temperature machines. Advanced Alloys Phoenix-exclusive metals for late-game casing. Core Logistics New wireless item transmission covers.

docs.title: ❓ FAQ
docs.text:
Is this compatible with GTCEu? Yes, it is designed as a direct addon for GregTech CEu Modern.

Where do I find Phoenix Ores? Most ores generate in the Nether and End; check the Ore Generation page.
